column4: *very* unlikely (and that's good so, he should  spend his time on more important things than on user-support, even if that fails IMHO)
nobody says he has to come here for user support... he could be coming here just to "eavesdrop" (on the ops, etc..)... i bet he's here and we don't know about it sometimes
same sort of wish-thinking that's behing "hey, I bet my local governor listens to this channel" :-) get rif of that one-person thinking. mark is not linux. he even isn't ubuntu :-)
i never suggest he was.. i think you're overthinking my comment
